description:
Back Garden (Left Boundary)  
T1: Cherry tree – Reduce height by 1m back to previous points, remove major deadwood  
Approx height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5m & spread to 3m)

Front Garden (Right Boundary)  
T2: Cherry tree – Reduce height by 1m back to previous points, remove major deadwood  
Approx height 4m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 2m) 
(Left Boundary)  
T3: Prunus tree – Fell to ground level, dig or grind out stump [watch out for cable around stump]
Approx height 3m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0m)

Reason for work 
General tree maintenance 
More light 
trees in decline
maintaining this tree in its current setting
suppressing growth of shrubs
overhanging foot path 
T3 - lifting drive way and causing trip hazzard - client happy to replace tree with something more suitable
